name: fsled
description: FSLed is the embeddable FSL editor and visualizer

scripts.clean: rimraf build -f && mkdir build && rimraf dist -f && mkdir dist
scripts.dist: cp build/fsled.es6.js dist/ && cp build/fsled.cjs.js dist/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run make && npm run dist

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
